channel.title: 2D platforming on Jefklaks Codex

item.title: Windows 2D Platforming
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: Platform games, one of the most dominant game genres in gaming history. They spawned a whole lot of spin-off series (run-and-gun, platform puzzles, Apogee’s shareware system, Mario 64’s 3D platform debut). Platform gaming has been the dominant type on every gaming platform for quite a while.
